description: Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.
Your eyes still bulge, yet your pupils look different somehow.  Water doesn't seem to cause any trouble at all, though.

name: Cooler eyes
heading: Cool Eyes
encumbrance_text: This is very stupid of you.
smash_message: You use your flippin' face to smash the %s.  EXTREME.

//: +2 PER if uncovered
description: Your eyes are compound, like those of an insect.  This increases your Perception by 2 whenever you aren't wearing eyewear.
Your visual processing has shifted: though you can see better in the dark, you're nearsighted in the light.  Maybe glasses would help.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.

//: + 4 tiles vision range, character.cpp
description: Your vision has become particularly acute: you suspect you could pick out zombies much farther away.  Perception +4.
Your eyes have mutated, with a brilliant iris and slitted pupil similar to that of a lizard.  This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.

//: 8 Env resist on eye
description: Like a true fish, your eyes lack eyelids, and are instead covered by a translucent, protective membrane that blocks irritants and water, and provides minor armor.  It also allows you to sleep with your eyes open!  Activate to cause the approach of hostile creatures to wake you up.

Your eyes barely protrude from your head on tentacles, preventing the use of any rigid eyewear.  On the plus side, you can have additional awareness, but sometimes your vision goes wonky as your brain tries to process the new angles.  Perception +1

Your eyes protrude from your head on flexible tentacles, preventing the use of any eyewear.  On the plus side, you can see in two directions at once, and they automatically retract to reduce damage.  Perception +2

//: MOUTH
description: Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.

//: Spawns a bone by shedding a tooth once a day
description: Your teeth have grown incredibly sharp, and have calcified even further.  In addition to letting you eat much faster, you can use them as a lethal natural weapon, as long as your anatomy favors it.  They also grow very fast, and you harmlessly shed them more or less at random.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your teeth

description: Your fangs have grown extremely large and incredibly sharp.  They make it impossible to wear mouthgear and difficult to eatâ€¦ but leave nasty wounds when you bite.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your saber teeth
attacks.attack_text_npc: %1$s tears into %2$s with their saber teeth

description: Your big teeth have grown in.  Folks had best show some more respect.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite into %s with your ratlike incisors

description: A set of tentacles surrounds your mouth.  They allow you to eat twice as fast.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.
A set of insect-like mandibles have grown around your mouth.  They allow you to eat faster and provide a slicing unarmed attack, but prevent wearing mouthwear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.
Your mandibles have developed extensible fangs, allowing you to bite quickly or ensure your venom goes home, as desired.
Your face resembles that of a bull, with a significant snout.  It looks fearsome but prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a wolfish muzzle.  It lends itself to biting in combat and looks impressive, but prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your jaw and nose have extended into a bearish muzzle.  You could bite with it, and it looks impressive, but it prevents wearing mouthgear.
Your face and jaw have extended, giving you an alert and attentive appearance.
Your face and jaws are a shorter version of those found on alligators.  They look NASTY--as do the bite wounds they can inflict--but prevent wearing mouthgear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You bite a chunk out of %s

description: Your face and jaws have widened like a frogs.  It looks hideous but it allows you to eat food whole.
You've gotten rid of that terribly imprecise mouth and now imbibe your food like a proper person.  Chewing was tiresome anyway.
You have a beak for a mouth.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouth gear.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

//: Attack does up to 6x10 stab dmg, dependent on dex and unarmed skill
description: Pecking at prey is part of your daily routine now.  Slightly reduces wet effects.

attacks.attack_text_u: You jackhammer into %s with your beak

description: Though your beak's not suitable for pecking, those flowers out there are a good source of energy.  Examine them to feed.

//: EXTRA ON HEAD
description: You have a pair of small horns on your head.  They allow you to make a weak piercing headbutt attack.
You have a pair of large curled horns, like those of a ram.  They allow you to make a strong bashing headbutt attack, but prevent wearing any headwear.

attacks.attack_text_u: You headbutt %s with your curled horns

description: You have a pair of long, pointed horns, like those of an antelope.  They allow you to make a strong piercing headbutt attack, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.

attacks.attack_text_u: You stab %s with your pointed horns

description: You have a huge rack of antlers, like those of a moose.  They allow you to make a weak headbutt attack, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.
You have a pair of antennae.  They allow you to detect the presence of monsters up to a few tiles away, even if you can't see or hear them, but prevent wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.

//: TORSO
description: You have grown a thick shell over your torso, providing excellent armor, but you cannot wear anything on your torso.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.
Your protective shell has grown large enough to accommodate--if need be--your whole body.  Activate to pull your head and limbs into your shell, trading mobility and vision for warmth and shelter.
Your protective shell has developed increased strength and hardness and a mother of pearl sheen.

//: EXTRA ON TORSO
description: You have a short, stubby tail, like a rabbit's.  It serves no purpose.
You have a fin-like tail.  It allows you to swim more quickly, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.

//: Can swat away dermatik attacks and fungal spores, depending on DEX
description: You have a long tail with a tuft on the end.  You find yourself instinctively swatting away flies with it, though it's not as effective at balancing you as you'd like.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long but hairless tail.  It's a pretty effective balancing aid, but does look, uh, ratty.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long and semi-stiff lizardlike tail.  You can't effectively strike with it in combat, but it significantly improves your balance.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a vicious stinger.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful bashing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
You have a pair of stubby little wings projecting from your shoulderblades.  They can be wiggled at will, but are useless.
You have a pair of large, leathery wings.  You can move them a little, but they are useless, and in fact put you off balance, reducing your ability to dodge slightly.

//: 50% chance to ignore a pit or a ledge
description: You have a very large pair of brightly-colored, very beautiful wings.  They can't lift you, and they make balancing tricky, but they certainly catch air and attention!

//: 100% chance to ignore pits and ledges
description: You have a pair of large, feathered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.
You have a pair of large, translucent wings.  They are too small to lift you, but are powerful enough to greatly speed your movement, with some effort and noise.
You have developed several vines sprouting from your shoulder area.  They're bulky, and get in the way.

//: Melee attack 2*STR/2 bash damage
description: You've developed the ability to control your vines; they make good lashes.  You can even rappel down sheer drops using them, but disconnecting HURTS.

//: Melee attack 3*STR/2 bash damage
description: You have full control of your vines, and can grow new ones and detach old ones more or less at will.

spawn_item.message: You detach a vine from your body.

//: ARMS
description: Your arms have grown vibrantly-colored feathers.  They effectively waterproof your arms and take the edge off hits, but really get in the way.  They're simply too small to help you in the air.

//: Miss messge
description: You've *finally* sprouted a pair of arms from your midsection.  They flail more or less uncontrollably, making you feel rather larval.

//: +1 Dex if torso uncovered, otherwise -1 and miss message. Climb chainlink fences for 90 moves if torso is uncovered.
description: It's good having all your arms.  Though they're too thin to block or punch, you can fold them inside human-shaped gear if need be.

//: Miss messge
description: There's the last two limbs you were expecting.  Unfortunately, you still can't coordinate them, so you're getting in your own way.  A lot.

//: +2 Dex if torso uncovered, otherwise -2 and miss message. Climb chainlink fences for 75 moves if torso is uncovered.
description: You have four handsome limbs, and then those mutant 'hand' and 'foot' things.  They probably aren't worth concealing.

//: If you have a hand free attacks for STR/3+1 bash damage
description: Your arms have transformed into tentacles, resulting in a +1 bonus to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and an inability to wear gloves.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

//: If you have a hand free attacks for (STR/3+1)*3 bash damage, otherwise for (STR/3+1)*2
description: Your arms have transformed into four tentacles, resulting in a +1 bonus to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and an inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 3 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

//: If you have a hand free attacks for (STR/3+1)*7 bash damage, otherwise for (STR/3+1)*6
description: Your arms have transformed into eight tentacles, resulting in a +1 bonus to Dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 30, and an inability to wear gloves.  You can make up to 7 extra attacks with them.  Somewhat decreases wet penalties.

//: HANDS
description: Your fingernails are long and sharp.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
Your claws have grown tougher and slightly gnarled.
Your paws are bone, muscle, and claw with a thin layer of skin and fur.  They might as well be made of stainless steel.
You have claws on the ends of your fingers, and can extend or retract them as desired.  Gloves will still get in the way, though.
Sharp claws are extending from the end of your fingers.

//: Modifies tentacle mutation's attack formula to (STR/2+1)*n cut damage
description: Your upper tentacles have grown large, hook-barbed rakes on the ends.  They're quite vicious, but really aren't suited for fine manipulation.
Your index fingers have grown into huge talons.  After a bit of practice, you find that this does not affect your dexterity, but allows for a deadly unarmed attack.  They also prevent wearing gloves.
The skin on your hands is now a mucous membrane that produces a thick, acrid slime.  Attacks using your hand will cause minor acid damage.  Slightly increases wet benefits.

//: Miss messge, hardcoded Str-dependent swim speed bonus
description: Your hands and feet are heavily webbed, reducing your Dexterity by 1 and causing problems with gloves.  However, you can swim much faster.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

//: Str-dependent swim speed modifier
description: Your hands have fused into quasi-paws.  Fine manipulation is a challenge: permanent hand encumbrance of 10, difficulty with delicate craftwork, and your gloves don't fit.  But they handle water better.

//: Str-dependent swim speed modifier
description: Your paws are much larger now.  Manual dexterity is difficult: permanent hand encumbrance of 20, serious problems crafting, and no gloves.  In return, though, you can swim better.

//: LEGS
//2: No penalty for not wearing shoes
description: Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%, makes your movement silent, increases your swimming speed, and reduces wet penalties.

//: Immune to being downed or knocked back when not wearing shoes, chance to avoid being pushed off stairs
description: Your lower tentacles have developed suckers.  They make land movement marginally more tiring, but do a good job of keeping you set in place.
Your legs have gained muscle mass to propel you across any terrain.
You've gained a strong ability to leap from a standing position.
You've gained a strong ability to leap a significant distance from a standing position and crush whatever you land on.

Your legs have consolidated into a single muscular 'foot' that goes up into your belly.  You move about a fourth of your previous speed and can no longer wear pants or shoes, on the other hand you make significantly less noise.  In addition to being harder to knock down, you can move through sludge-covered surfaces easily.
You've gained a strong ability to leap a short distance from a standing position with little preparation time.
//: This is differentiated from the other two leaps by a shorter range yet a shorter prep time. Probably less useful than them since it will still exhaust you.
FEET
description: The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10% bonus when moving barefoot.
You have grown large, curved, and wickedly sharp talons in place of your big toes.  Fortunately, they don't get in the way of your movement.  Unfortunately, they do prevent wearing footgear.

//: Doesn't actually check for kicking attacks
description: Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you cannot wear shoes of any kind.  Reduces wet effects.

//: Fast tree communion, Half thirst/hunger/sleep while communing with trees, no penalty for no shoes, morale down from shoes

description.//~: The idea is that you, for lack of a better term, plant yourself.  Crafting and digging don't count because they presume a certain amount of movement during the task.  The handheld game does count.
description.str: It's about time you started developing a root system.  When reading, fishing, waiting, or otherwise being stationary for a while on diggable terrain, you'll extract nutrients and water from the soil.

//: Same as ROOTS2, just slower move speed
description: You find it difficult not to sink roots when able.  You extract nutrients and water whenever on diggable terrain, but move more slowly.

//: GENERAL?
description: Your pseudopod-like limbs can fit into anything!  +4 Dexterity, -4 Strength.

//: Resist flashbangs, fine vision not impaired by bile or darkness (?), in general no sigh_impaired() (??)
description: You can now extend and reabsorb sensory organs at will, and can therefore ignore most shocks that would overwhelm lesser beings.

//: Blinds, deafens and hallucinates once an hour each, slightly resist flashbangs, always sight_impaired(?)
description: Your sense organs are all over the place: eyes extending and retracting, 'ears' of various shapes migrating about, and taste & smell are uncontrollable.  The world is a horrible mixup.  Ugh!
Your flesh is a pleasing gel-like consistency.  Your bodily functions seem to be moving around, and your leg-equivalents flow comfortably - if a little slower than your old meat-legs.
